data.enText: connected with or caused by earthquakes
having a very great effect; of very great size
a seismic shift in the political process

tr: subject to or caused by an earthquake or earth vibration

example.ex: Earthquakes produce two types of seismic waves...
The latest seismic activity was also felt in northern Kenya.
example.tran: 肯尼亚北部也感觉到了最近的地震活动。

value.def: Seismic means caused by or relating to an earthquake.

example.ex: I have never seen such a seismic shift in public opinion in such a short period of time.
example.tran: 我从未见过公众舆论在如此短的时间内发生如此巨大的转变。

value.def: A seismic shift or change is a very sudden or dramatic change.
value.tran: (转变、变化)突如其来的，巨大的，急剧的
